The Cloudstyle Men's 3 Piece Dress Suit has a sharp look that’s perfect for formal occasions. The fabric has a nice sheen, giving it a polished appearance. However, the fit was a bit off for me, requiring some tailoring for a better look. While the price is excellent for a complete suit, the quality could be improved in some areas, such as stitching and lining. Overall, it’s a decent option if you’re willing to invest a little extra time in adjustments.

评论概述: Gotta admit, I’m kind of surprised…
评论详情: I’ve lost a few pounds over the last year or so and my old suit doesn’t really fit anymore. My lady friend had a loss in the family and I needed something quick. Arrived overnight, packed in a rather small box. Was not expecting much. Opened it. Fabric feels substantial-ish. A few loose threads, hear and there. Pocket square is sown in (and is a bit crooked, rakish even, but not very “funeral”) and cannot be removed.  Jacket fit like a glove. Vest is a bit too large but is adjustable. Pant wast is “adjustable” as there is elastic in the waste band for some stretch. Pant leg is a smidge too long but not that you’d notice unless you knew what to look for. Overall, for the cost, an absolute steal but it’s not a suit I would expect to last for years.  Make sure to measure yourself before you buy. My measurements had changed so much that I went to Men’s Wearhouse to get updated measurements. It helped a lot when I selected my suit size.

My husband and I were both in a wedding over the weekend and this was a last minute "oh no, I hope this works" purchase. The quality is far better than expected, value is great, material is sturdy yet soft. I think the only "complaint" He said he wishes there were more real pockets. Otherwise, it fit great, he got an XL, it looked great, and he said it was comfortable.
Suit is at least two sizes smaller than labeled, if not more.  Quality of item is also extremely poor.  AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

评论概述: Excellent fit and great value for price.
评论详情: Purchased this suit for my sons wedding.  Product can in on time and fits perfectly.  To make sure your suit fits properly view the sizing chart and make sure you know your sizing for a suit.  This helps out so you don’t purchase the wrong size.  Also, I have seen people post reviews that the pockets are sewn shut. If you’ve ever bought a new suit or dress slacks, you've noticed some pockets are sewn. The reason for this is purely aesthetic. You can easily remove the single stitch from the pockets using a thread puller or scissors.  Hope this helps.

Very nice suit and very affordable. My son is 6' and 280lbs and usually wears a 2xl so I ordered a 3xl. The vest and jacket were snug, but fit. The pants were way too small, so I ordered different pants and they looked great with the jacket.

评论概述: I ordered “Regular” fit. I got slim fit…..:((
评论详情: Been looking at suits for day and when I saw this one with “regular fit” I was glad to order it. When it arrived I was pleased with the quality of the fabric and sewing in it… it looked and feels like it would cost more. Then I tried it on. The pants are only describable as skinny. For anyone with more then chicken legs, they will make you feel constricted and on able to sit without your thighs and calves being strangled. The jacket and vest are sport cut…. That’s not the bad part. The sport cut differential is huge in this jacket. My chest is larger then my belly, by a decent “dad bod/ex-regular gym guy” amount but the cut on this jacket made me think I need to wear a corset with the suit. As a guy who has lost weight (yes, I dropped belly weight) this suit made me feel like I hadn’t accomplished anything.
Purchased for my dad, he really like his suite and the way it fits him
Does not fit

This suit came in quit and with little tailoring was an excellent fit.  My only concern was the lack of functional pockets.  I had my tailor open the pockets, so not a huge deal.  I would definitely recommend this suit.

The jacket has massive amount of fabric in the upper torso, shoulder and arms for size. The waist area of jacket is just fine. Unbelievable rest of jacket! I pulled out the suit for my husband’s dad’s funeral and it was the absolute straw that brought us to tears!

Material feels great. I Wish you could mix and match pant to jacket size. Went with the right jacket size and having the pants altered easy enough. Love the navy blue color. Overall a 5 stars and would buy again for $90

Fit was almost perfect. A little tight in the thighs when sitting but nothing that was worth returning for a one time event. Color and size was great.  Sizing was appropriate.  Pants and sleeves were long enough. Just needed to iron before wearing. My spouse looked sharp in this suit. Pockets were fake sewn but could open if needed. Buttons were fine...a few had a hint of red but not really noticeable. He's 6' and measured 42. Bought the 42 and 44 but ultimately his size of 42 fit. Would recommend despite the low cost compared typical suits.

评论概述: Little smaller than expected, surprisingly nice for the price
评论详情: So size-wise, it says it runs accurately, but its a little slimmer than normal.  I normally wear a size 46 regular coat, and 40/32 in dress pants. The XXL fits more like a 44 Regular Coat, and the pants are more like 38/32, but they do have some stretch to them so they were comfortable,  but tight around the legs and calves. I am guessing they were made to be slim fit even though the title didnt mention it. Too tight for me to wear and like the appearance.  Quality-wise, it wasn't too bad for the price, I was pleasantly surprised.  The pants were a little thinner than most department store brands as well. The vest was tighter than I would like as well, I can't say how it compared to any other sizing because I don't normally wear a vest, but it was snug. Below is how I estimate size compared to say a suit from Kohl's or JC Penny.Cloudstyle XXL = 44 Regular Coat - 38/32 Pants
Very last minute. Husband needed a suit for a very fancy wedding. The fit and quality was great and for the price you can’t go wrong. He looked great and got lots of compliments.
The first suit ordered wrong size. No problem with Amazon sent it back got new one in days. He looked great
Very cheap returning.

So we tried two sizes for my partner. A large and an extra large. The extra large was comically too big on him. The legs on the pants were 6 inches too long and the jacket made him look like a kid. The large was too tight. We got lucky the pants didn't rip. The jacket was too short in the arms and wouldn't button. The size differences was weird. But it worked for the few hours he needed to wear it.
Nice price for event wear. We ended up returning because of fit. Had it fit, it would have worked for us.

The suit was nice enough but the fit was way off. Pants were very tight and this was classic fit. My son's are black with muscular bodies. They do have muscular thighs and butts.  I bought two suits and I was able to fit the jacket and vest to my younger son but had to purchase slacks to his suit. I am sending the gray suit back. I would have returned the black suit but I didn't have the time. It was more cost conducive to buy slacks for that suit so I will donate the black slacks to my local thrift store. The jacket and  vest fit snug but not to tight. The suit I bought to replace suit was navy blue and cost 186.00. I was trying to prevent such a costly purchase since my boys would have little need for a dress up suit.  They just wear long sleeve shirts khakis and and ties for church.  I measured carefully and bought suits that were recommended for weight and height of my son's.

评论概述: Runs REALLY small and Missing Pants.
评论详情: I think the quality was very nice. However the dress suit runs SUPER SMALL! I ordered 2 different t sizes even, one of then a size bigger than my husband wears at all. He could barely fit in to outfit.  Also one of the orders I got was missing the dress pants completely! The xl vest BARELY fit with it open, nevermind it being buttoned. Which he didn't attempt to do as he didn't want to break vest.  I will say the material and question of suit was very nice though. I wish it had fit. Company needs to work on sizing for sure. Also make sure entire 3 pieces of pant suit is sent. Like I said he didn't recieve the pants with one of the sizes at all. Unfortunately have to return this item.

Jacket felt a bit too snug, but the pants and vest fit perfectly. Quality of the materials felt a bit lower than I expected too. Jacket and vest pockets are for show only and not use (sewn shut without actual pocket lining).
Nice color, fit and price!
6’0” 215 pounds- 34” waist. Pants fit fine, jacket and vest way too small. Go a size up.
I took all my husband's measurements and ordered accordingly. An XL should've been perfect, but everything was too tight. Gonna have to return.

This is a great suit. I was able to remove the white insert in the breast pocket, cut the tacking out of the jacket back pleat, and cut the stitching to open up the pockets. Twenty minutes in my steam dryer and it's ready to wear. Pay careful attention to the size chart. Very satisfied for the price.
Small sized and built with cheap fabric

Wow! I am SO surprised that this suit fit my husband absolutely perfectly! He's 5 ft 9.5 in tall and weighs about 185lbs. We ordered the black XL and everything fit perfect even the length. It looks REALLY good on him. The quality looks wonderful. We had visited some stores such as JCPennys, Kohl's, and another store looking for an affordable suit. We were looking at $500 for it all. We couldn't do that and weren't going to for a 1 time event. So we ordered this one and were not disappointed, but impressed. We compared it to the $500 suits at those higher priced stores and didn't see or feel much of a difference. Much better than we expected. He said it's comfortable and fits well. I really like the material too. It's not like suits from decades ago that are very thick and stiff like. This is an easy to move in suit. We're very happy with it.
Great price for what you get. Decent quality and comfortable. Husband looked very handsome at wedding.
First suit bought for my grandson to attend a wedding. He liked, he looked sharp and was complimented by all. Fit good for online ordering
Good deal looks good didn’t fit right worth it to have a seamstress alter.

I ordered a 3 XL suit that was still way to small. I also ordered a light gray suit and got a dark gray suit instead. Pants super uncomfortable, hard to move with the inseam sewn really tight. This company could do themselves a favor and offer the jackets in long for the taller men.
I recommend the suit to every man who wants to dress to impress. Five stars, all around. Frabric is amazing . Comfort is impeccable.

You may hear horror stories about "mail order suits."  Fear not!  My wife and I are going to attend a (more) formal dinner than usual. I felt a  black 3 piece suite would be appropriate. I Ordered and held my breath. Came and fit as advertised. However, will need to hem the pants (no problem) and run by to get it steamed. Otherwise all is well and I will look as well dressed as can be expected. Would order again in the future.
